title: How to Complete a Collateral Damage Mission in Red Faction: Guerrilla

steps.headline: Mark the mission on your map.
Start the mission.
steps.description: Wait for Jenkins to arrive in his custom vehicle.

steps.headline: Mount the turret on the vehicle.
Fire at the EDF.
steps.description: Jenkins will drive around the sector as he gains the EDF's attention.

steps.headline: Shoot and destroy EDF property.
steps.description: All EDF property will be marked with a yellow arrow.

steps.headline: Keep shooting EDF personnel and property until the damage point goal is reached.
Wait for Jenkins to take you back to a base.

text: Mark the mission on your map. Travel to the mission marker. Start the mission. Wait for Jenkins to arrive in his custom vehicle. Mount the turret on the vehicle.  Fire at the EDF. Jenkins will drive around the sector as he gains the EDF's attention. Shoot and destroy EDF property. All EDF property will be marked with a yellow arrow. Keep shooting EDF personnel and property until the damage point goal is reached.  Wait for Jenkins to take you back to a base. Exit the vehicle.
